method: In a large pot, bring chicken broth to a boil.
Add chicken breast, carrots, peas, and sweet potatoes to the pot.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
Remove the chicken breast from the pot, shred it with a fork, and return it to the pot.
Serve the soup to your dog and watch their tail wag with delight!
